mapper.select: select t1.id , t1.dict_code , t1.dict_name , t1.dict_type , t1.validate_state , t1.version from sys_dict t1 where t1.id = #{id}
mapper.insert:
insert into sys_dict ( dict_code , dict_name , dict_type , validate_state , version ) values( #{dto.dictCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{dto.dictName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , '0' , '1' , '1'
)
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(1) from sys_dict WHERE DICT_CODE=#{dictCode}
